ygData.subject: Re: New Spells Apparently Being Implemented
ygData.msgSnippet: Why have we never met? Virten 24 SK, Sol Ro. And yes, Human SK s are a royal pain and, well, I m just glad to get some affirmation. Let us know if you want
ygData.messageBody:
Why have we never met? Virten 24 SK, Sol Ro.

And yes, Human SK's are a royal pain and, well, I'm just glad to get some
affirmation.

Let us know if you want more feedback or assistance. I'm sure most everyone
here would be more than willing to help in any way possible. I know I sure
would. I love the SK and I love the RP possibilities it presents just wish
it wasn't such a hard path. :)

Virten, who had HT resisted for 9 points by a skeleton yesterday.



> THANK YOU!!!...all I can say 'cause I play a human SK, which is pretty
rare
> on my server (SOL RO) and it is hell but I keep at it.
>
> Darc Stormreaver
> Sol Ro
